data.snippet:
Company profile: Pranjal Projects provides a range of services, including sheet metal fabrication, pre-engineered buildings (PEB), and heavy engineering fabrication.
 Key products and services:
  + Structural steel solutions for infrastructure projects like steel bridges and railway stations.
  + Fabricated components for earth-moving equipment and heavy machinery.
  + Heavy engineering equipment, including boilers, pressure vessels, and storage tanks for industries such as oil, gas, and power.
  + Various steel products like TMT bars, plates, and beams. [...] Post Job

Company Description

Pranjal Projects Pvt Ltd was originally founded as a partnership firm in 1980 by H.C. Bhatia and was incorporated as a private limited company in 2002. It is now promoted by H.C. Bhatia and his sons, Vikas and Deepak Bhatia. The company is an Indian infrastructure and fabrication firm specializing in structural steel solutions for a diverse range of industries.

Established date

While the company was founded as a partnership firm in 1980, it was formally incorporated as Pranjal Projects Private Limited on May 13, 2002. [...] Share This Profile:

data.title: Pranjal Projects | LinkedIn
data.snippet:
Welcome to Pranjal Projects Pvt. Ltd., a beacon of excellence in sheet metal fabrication since 1980. Our commitment to continuous improvement is embodied in the principles of Kaizen, ensuring that every aspect of our operations is refined for optimal efficiency and quality. Specializing in high-rise steel buildings, bridges, metro systems, airports, and railway construction, Pranjal Projects is also a distinguished manufacturer of parts for cranes and the OEM industry. From precision-engineered buckets and skids to intricately crafted cabins and chassis, our expertise extends across a diverse range of products. Pranjal Projects is proud to be an ISO-certified company, exemplifying our unwavering dedication to maintaining the highest standards in every endeavor. We have implemented [...] ### Website

data.title: About Us - Pranjal Projects
data.snippet:
# About Us

## About Pranjal Projects

Founded in 1980, Pranjal Projects Pvt. Ltd. has established itself as a leading name in the sheet metal fabrication and infrastructure industries. With over 40 years of excellence, we are ISO 9001:2008 and RDSO certified, known for delivering high-quality steel bridges, Pre-Engineered Building (PEB) solutions, and large-scale infrastructure projects.

Beyond our expertise in infrastructure, Pranjal Projects is also a trusted manufacturer of earth-moving equipment parts, boilers, and heavy engineering equipment for the oil and gas sector. Our advanced steel fabrication capabilities allow us to serve diverse industries, providing precise, durable solutions that meet the rigorous demands of these sectors. [...] #### Values

Integrity in all interactions, innovation through cutting-edge solutions, a commitment to sustainability with eco-friendly practices, especially in renewable energy, and excellence in meeting global standards to create lasting value.

## Promoters

#### H.C. Bhatia

Chairman

#### Vekas Bhatia

Managing Director

#### Deepak Bhatia

Managing Director

#### Aryan Raj Bhatia

Director [...] With a robust portfolio of successful projects and state-of-the-art facilities, Pranjal Projects remains at the forefront of engineering excellence, delivering comprehensive solutions that drive India’s infrastructure growth and support critical sectors like oil and gas and heavy machinery.

#### Mission

Deliver high-quality structural steel solutions through exceptional service and customized approaches that exceed customer expectations, fostering trust and long-term success.

#### Vision

To shape India’s infrastructure by delivering quality, innovative projects that drive the nation’s progress towards becoming a global powerhouse.

#### Values

data.title: Pranjal Projects
data.snippet:
# Ethical & Innovative Steel Solutions

With over 45 years of expertise, Pranjal Projects Pvt. Ltd. stands as one of India’s leading infrastructure and fabrication companies. From the steel that builds India’s tallest structures to precision-engineered components that power heavy machinery, we are committed to excellence, innovation, and sustainable growth.

As the largest Pre-Engineered Building (PEB) supplier and an RDSO-approved provider for railways and bridges, we deliver comprehensive solutions that span multiple sectors, ensuring the success of projects across India.

Read More

## Our Achievements & Legacy

#### 45+

years of expertise

#### 1,00,000+

tons of steel fabricated yearly

#### 10,000+

projects executed

India’s largest Pre-Engineered Building supplier [...] ##### Manoj, Director

“Pranjal Projects has consistently delivered innovative and high-quality solar structures for our plants. Their commitment to sustainability and precision engineering makes them a key contributor to our renewable energy efforts.”

##### Amit, Project Manager

## Our Clientele

More Clients [...] ##### Anil, Chief Engineer, Indian Railways

“Their expertise in handling complex bridge construction at challenging locations has been invaluable. Pranjal Projects’ team showed tremendous dedication and technical know-how, ensuring the structures were not only aesthetically pleasing but structurally sound.”

##### Vikram, Lead Structural Consultant, Bridges

“Our collaboration with Pranjal for construction equipment parts has been fantastic. Their components are durable, reliable, and have significantly improved our machinery’s performance.”

##### Suresh, Procurement Lead

“The quality and consistency of their steel products have been unmatched. Pranjal Projects has always delivered custom solutions tailored to our needs, making them a vital partner in our supply chain.”

## Pranjal Dahiya Biography / Wiki [...] ### Success with “52 Gaj Ka Daman”

Her big break came in 2020 with the viral track “52 Gaj Ka Daman.” The video surpassed 1.5 billion views on YouTube, becoming 1 of the top-100 most-viewed Indian videos of all time. The song made Pranjal a national sensation and led to more collaborations and brand deals.

### Notable Songs and Projects

Over the course of time, Pranjal Dahiya was seen in many hit songs, such as:

 DJ Pe Matkungi
 Thanedar Piya (with Renuka Panwar)
 Jutti Kali – by Diler Kharkiya
 BP High
 Kamli
 Tokk
 Raavan
 Goli Se Lage
 Gypsy Girl
 Sweety
 Fire Mardi
 Baazigar (with Keshav Jangra)

She made her acting debut with the Haryanvi movie “Rose Rosy te Gulab,” in which she had a role described as natural and charming on screen.

### Artistic Identity [...] ## Pranjal Dahiya Biography / Wiki

Pranjal Dahiya is an Indian singer, model and actress who got immense popularity in the Haryanvi music industry. She’s known for her natural charm, expressive performances and rootedness in Haryana, and has become the local superstar redefined by modern times.

Table of Contents

Toggle

Pranjal was born and brought up in Faridabad, hailing from a conservative Haryanvi family. It was not an easy road to choose entertainment for her. But with determination and vision, now she is one of the best-paid female artists in the Haryanvi circuit. To go from small-town aspirations to national acclaim is truly inspirational.
